LVA partners with K-8 families wanting the flexibility of an at-home learning environment combined with the support of highly-qualified teachers and the opportunity to participate with other scholars at one of our brick-and-mortar campuses.

Please take some time to review the information on our website, and to watch the attached recordings of one of our info nights from this past summer. Or join us for a Virtual Information Session, on Wednesdays from 1:00-1:30pm!

-Make a summer scrapbook: get your scholar a throw away camera to take pictures of the things they enjoy doing during the summer then before school starts back up work with them to make a scrapbook of all of their pictures!

-Go on a scavenger hunt: you can come up with different clues to give your scholar to help them find the things on some kind of themed scavenger hunt! The more creative your clues are, the more they will have to use their minds to figure out what they are searching for.
